name: restapi-nodejs-express
description: Setup  1. npm init -y : initializing a new Node.js project with default settings  2. 2.create a file index.js in the project folder 3. npm install -save express : is used to install the Express.js framework as a dependency for a Node.js project 4. npm install nodemon --save-dev : for the "start" script to work, you need to have nodemon installed as a dependency in your project. 5.  edit scripts in package.json    "start": "nodemon index.js" 6. run your project by npm start
